pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

pathParameters.name: name
pathParameters.description: Name of the App Service plan.

pathParameters.name: vnetName
pathParameters.description: Name of the Virtual Network.

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).
